about_the_game:
Agent Brain: Tricky Puzzle is a groundbreaking puzzle platformer that challenges players to think outside the box in ways they've never imagined.

Every level introduces a unique solution method, breaking the fourth wall between the game and the player in unprecedented ways. From using a pause button to halt threats to turning off the sound to put an enemy NPC to sleep, the game continually surprises and engages players.

"We want this game to delight players at every level, ensuring they always experience that Aha! moment. That’s the essence we’re capturing here."

In addition to the main puzzles, the game conceals well-hidden secrets that aren't so easy to uncover, adding an extra layer of challenge for those daring enough to seek them out.

Dev team is committed to enriching the game post-launch, with plans for new levels, updates and additional content to keep the gameplay fresh and exciting.

Agent Brain: Tricky Puzzle is more than just a game; it's an invitation to think differently, explore the limits of your creativity, and uncover its well-hidden secrets.

Dive in and let each challenge inspire your next great solution.
